name: Here and There in 10 Seconds
description:
Make your cat travel through time and space to get to the end! Controls

WASD to Move
Space to Jump
Shift to Dash
C to Shrink
ESC to Quit

Made for Ludum Dare 51 - Every 10 Seconds This is my first ever game jam! I learned a lot and have a lot to say about it and will do so in a dev post! Overall, I think that this game is more of a proof of concept than anything else, but I'm proud of what I did in the short time!
